attributes.action: Reinstate the Voice of the Tube
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign this petition if you think the LU bosses have gone mad in sacking Emma Clarke for her spoof on her blog, LU state that it is not because of the spoof it is because she bad mouthed the underground network by sayig she would never travel on the network but we all know that it was in fact because of her spoof announcements that I found rather enjoyable. Sign this petition and get 'the voice of the tube' back.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
